data.title: Stephen Boyd
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of Stephen Boyd on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text:
Highest Rated: 100% The Bravados (1958)

Lowest Rated: 12% The Oscar (1966)

Birthday: Jul 4, 1931

Birthplace: Glengormley, Northern Ireland, UK

Entered English film in 1955 and gained international recognition for his role in "Ben Hur" (1959). Boyd subsequently appeared in a number of American and low-budget European productions.

Highest rated movies

100% The Bravados

93% The Fall of the Roman Empire

92% Fantastic Voyage

88% The Man Who Never Was

85% Ben-Hur

60% Hannie Caulder

57% The Best of Everything

50% Shalako
